data.title: Husband
data.meta_description: The only charting jazz band in San Diego with four best jazz album of the year nominations 21' 22' 23' 24'
data.text:
Also on the album is Gary Husband, who's toured and recorded with John McLaughlin, Chick Corea, Billy Cobham, Allan Holdsworth to name a few, as well as his solo albums. On this album, Gary plays drums, acoustic and electric piano and synth, and co-produced, and oversaw the mixing and mastering of the album with George Murphy and Andrew Tulloch in the UK.

2024 jazz rock fusion album Morgan|Husband|Feraud A Soul in Time on Guitar One Records. Veteran guitarist James Morgan is joined by both, Gary Husband on drums, synth and pianos and Hadrien Feraud on bass. Guest artists include Eric Marienthal on sax and percussionist Joey De Leon. This album harkens back to jazz rock fusion of the 1970s with a modern twist. This album is artistry in motion, evoking emotions that transport you to an unearthly place of joy and wonderment.

â€‹All songs were co-written by James Morgan and legendary guitarist Dean Brown, and produced by James Morgan, Gary Husband and Dean Brown.
